languages.text: Случайный блик пролетает по множеству крошечных лезвий, будто проросших изнутри Идиры.

traits.locale_text: Случайный блик пролетает по множеству крошечных лезвий, проросших изнутри Идиры, будто шипы на шее калибанского льва.

languages.text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.
languages.original_text: Случайный блик пролетает по множеству крошечных лезвий, будто проросших изнутри Идиры.

traits.locale_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.
A stray ray of light reflects from the countless tiny blades sprouting from the inside of Idira's body like the spikes on the neck of a Calibanite lion.
A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.
A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.
A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.
A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

languages.text: Un rayon de lumière se reflète sur une foule de lames minuscules qui semblent émerger directement du corps d'Idira.
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: Un rayon de lumière se reflète sur une foule de lames minuscules qui semblent émerger directement du corps d'Idira.

languages.text: 在光线的照射下，无数细小的刀片泛着寒光，看起来就像是从伊迪拉的身体里长出来的一样。
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: 在光线的照射下，无数细小的刀片泛着寒光，看起来就像是从伊迪拉的身体里长出来的一样。

languages.text: イディラの体内から生えたような無数の小さな刃に、一筋の光が反射している。
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: イディラの体内から生えたような無数の小さな刃に、一筋の光が反射している。

languages.text: In den unzählig vielen winzigen Klingen spiegelt sich ein einfallender Lichtstrahl. Die Klingen wirken, als würden sie aus Idiras Körper herauswachsen.
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: In den unzählig vielen winzigen Klingen spiegelt sich ein einfallender Lichtstrahl. Die Klingen wirken, als würden sie aus Idiras Körper herauswachsen.

languages.text: Un fugaz rayo de luz se refleja en las innumerables y diminutas cuchillas que parecen haber brotado del interior del cuerpo de Idira.
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: Un fugaz rayo de luz se refleja en las innumerables y diminutas cuchillas que parecen haber brotado del interior del cuerpo de Idira.

languages.text: İdira'nın vücudunun içinden fırlamış gibi duran sayısız küçük bıçak, anlık bir parıltıyla göze çarpıyor.
languages.original_text: A passing ray of light reflects off the countless tiny blades that look like they sprouted from inside Idira's body.

traits.locale_text: İdira'nın vücudunun içinden fırlamış gibi duran sayısız küçük bıçak, geçici bir parıltıda göze çarpıyor.
